info.name: ntuaflix_api
info.description:
## **Getting started guide**

To start using the ntuaflix API, you need to know tha following:

- You must use a valid API Key to send requests to the API endpoints. You can get your API key from sending a /login request with correct username and password.
- The API only responds to HTTPS-secured communications. Any requests sent via HTTP return an HTTP 301 redirect to the corresponding HTTPS resources.
- The API returns request responses in JSON or CSV format.
    

## Authentication

The ntuaflix API uses JWT token for authentication.

You must include an API key in each request to the ntuaflix API with the X-OBSERVATION-AUTH request header.

### Authentication error response

If an API key is missing, malformed, or invalid, you will receive an HTTP 401 Unauthorized response code.

item.description: The user endpoints provide authentication and some queries about titles and names to the authenticated user.

item.name: Admin
upload

request.description:
The tsv provided should be given in following form:

| tconst | titleType | primaryTitle | originalTitle | isAdult | startYear | endYear | runtimeMinutes | genres | img_url_asset |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |

body.raw:
tconst	titleType	primaryTitle	originalTitle	isAdult	startYear	endYear	runtimeMinutes	genres	img_url_asset
tt0000001	short	Carmencita	Carmencita	0	1894	\N	1	Documentary,Short	\N
tt0000002	short	Le clown et ses chiens	Le clown et ses chiens	0	1892	\N	5	Animation,Short	\N
tt0000003	short	Pauvre Pierrot	Pauvre Pierrot	0	1892	\N	4	Animation,Comedy,Romance	\N
tt0000004	short	Un bon bock	Un bon bock	0	1892	\N	\N	Animation,Short	\N
tt0000005	short	Blacksmith Scene	Blacksmith Scene	0	1893	\N	1	Short	\N
tt0000006	short	The Sneeze	The Sneeze	0	1894	\N	1	Documentary,Short	\N
tt0000007	short	The Boxing Cats (Prof. Welton’s)	The Boxing Cats (Prof. Welton’s)	0	1896	\N	1	Short,Action	\N
tt0000008	short	After the Ball	After the Ball	0	1897	\N	1	Musical,Short	\N
tt0000009	short	The Clown Barber	The Clown Barber	0	1898	\N	1	Comedy,Short	\N
tt0000010	short	The Cowboy’s Christmas	The Cowboy’s Christmas	0	1899	\N	1	Western,Short	\N

request.description:

item.description: The upload endpoints add title and name related data provided by tsv files
The /admin endpoints provide upload priviledges and queries related to user managment

variable.value: jwt encrypted value, given by /login each time
